mapper.update: update item_kill set total = total -1 where item_id = #{itemId} and total > 0
mapper.select: select a.id,name,total,start_time,end_time, ( CASE WHEN ( now() BETWEEN start_time AND end_time AND total > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS isKill from item join item_kill as a on item.id = a.item_id and a.is_active = 1;

select a.id,name,total,start_time,end_time,item_id, ( CASE WHEN ( now() BETWEEN start_time AND end_time AND total > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS isKill from item join item_kill as a on item.id = a.item_id and a.is_active = 1 and a.item_id = #{itemId};
